snippet: Three witnesses testified on Wednesday they had not worked as poll watchers for John F. Haggerty Jr., who is accused of stealing more than $1 million from the mayor.
lead_paragraph: Three witnesses testified on Wednesday they had not worked as poll watchers for John F. Haggerty Jr., who is accused of stealing more than $1 million from the mayor.

headline.main: 3 Witnesses Rebut Claim by Consultant on Poll Work
headline.print_headline: 3 Witnesses Rebut Claim By Consultant On Poll Work
headline.seo: In Haggerty Trial, Poll Watchers Testify They Were Not Paid
